function RYU_EP05_19()
    -- .結-2【3月第1週】「姫皇選挙-姫巫女ｖｓ姫皇-」
    SaveData.Title = "姫皇選挙-姫巫女ｖｓ姫皇-"

    -- //BG：ステージ上
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024eb")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Called by Daria-san, I headed to the center of the stage. ]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（笑顔）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc001ac")
LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(50,700,-160)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask008" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM13.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0606.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Ladies & Gentle Girls! Thank you all for waiting so patiently!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0607.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "We will now begin the 2019 'Princess Election'! The host and MC, bearing the title of 'Battle Princess,' is third-year student Daria Himegami!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,700,-160)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0608.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Now, no one wants any unnecessary explanations. Without further ado, let me introduce the two who will compete for today's Princess throne with their cuteness!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024eb")
    -- //BU：アルメリア（通常・ラスボス）、ダリア（笑顔）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU03aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0609.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "First, here is Hermes Himegami! The current Princess, an overwhelmingly beautiful girl famed as a top idol!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0610.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Opposing her is 'Princess Priestess' Uran Ryuguuin! Known as the Academy's finest Yamato Nadeshiko, skilled in tea ceremony, flower arrangement, koto, and many traditional arts!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0611.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Both are breathtaking beauties who captivate hearts, but only one will claim the crown of the next Princess!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,400,0,100,500)

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0612.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Please vote with your honest feelings for the 'Princess' you like!" ]])

    -- //SE：歓声（MAX)
PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav",0,true)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ The overwhelming cheers. I've handled many jobs as a 'Princess,' but this is the first time I've stood on a stage this electrified. ]])

    MSG([[ Inevitably, my heartbeat quickened. ]])


STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)

    -- //BU：ダリア（笑顔）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc001ad")
LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01ea")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"EV01_BUS_ARU03aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,700,-160)
LAYER_POSITION(55,400,-160)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,700,-160)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0613.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Now then, let me explain the rules. Hermes and Uran-kun will alternately showcase their appeals freely." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(50,700,-160)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0614.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "The audience will watch their appeals and vote on their tablets for the one they want to support. Changing your vote midway is also allowed." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0615.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "After each has finished their ten-minute appeal, the one with the most votes becomes the next Princess!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0616.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "The theme for this appeal is ‘Freedom.’ Please support these two as they each strive in their own way from the audience seats." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,700,-160)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0617.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Now, let's start the appeals! Before we do... I'll show you the current voting rates. Open!!!" ]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
--PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    MSG([[ The venue began to murmur. And no wonder— ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024eb")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //CI：得票率 エルメス50：ウラン50 155
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI155a")
LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ My votes were on par with Lady Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ For a nationally popular celebrity, and someone like me, generally unknown, to stand shoulder to shoulder. ]])

    MSG([[ It had to be a shocking sight. ]])

    MSG([[ But the most surprised person was right beside me. ]])

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    -- //BU：アルメリア（焦り・ラスボス）、ダリア（悲しみ）
-- LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU03ga")
-- LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0502.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "No... this isn’t... this can’t be happening..." ]])

    MSG([[ Lady Hermes muttered something repeatedly in a low voice. ]])

    MSG([[ It was clear she was in a similar state as when Hiyu-san once flustered her. ]])

    MSG([[ It was painful to watch, and it broke my heart, but this was my only chance to win. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0933.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Daria-san, I shall begin my performance now." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Thinking this was my moment, I approached the center of the stage. ]])

    MSG([[ However— ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ef")
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-800,200)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

    -- //BU：アルメリア（邪悪笑み・ラスボス）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU03na")
LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0503.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "No sneaking ahead, Uran-chan<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> I have to make everyone smile." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0504.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Hehe...<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> That's right, that's right... I am Hermes Himegami... Mother’s greatest masterpiece...! I can't be down...! I have to do this!" ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    MSG([[ Blocking my path, Lady Hermes stood in the center of the stage and triumphantly pointed to the ceiling. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav",1000,true)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024eb")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ea")
LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0505.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Everyone, thanks for waiting~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Your idol, Hermes-chan, will show you the absolute best appeal ever~~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0506.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The theme is simply 'Cute'! I'll use the full ten minutes to sing, dance, and make everyone happyーーーーーーー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    -- //SE：黄色い声援
PLAY_SE("SEf007.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ As Lady Hermes shouted, music started playing from somewhere. ]])

    MSG([[ Lady Hermes began dancing intensely to the music, completely different from Japanese traditional dance. ]])

    MSG([[ A performance seen many times before. The audience began to go wild. ]])

STOP_SE("SEf007.wav",3000)

    MSG([[ However, upon closer look, the dance lacked the sparkle it once had, and the enthusiasm gradually cooled. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU03ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0507.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "W-What’s wrong!? Everyone seems off today!?" ]])

    MSG([[ In the middle of the song, Lady Hermes asked while dancing. ]])

    MSG([[ But even if asked, probably no one could clearly explain. ]])

    MSG([[ The sharpness of her movements remained. Her singing was even more alluring and mature than before. ]])

    MSG([[ But the intense individuality and brilliance Lady Hermes once radiated could no longer be felt. ]])

    MSG([[ It was a strange feeling I’d never experienced before. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU03ga")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0508.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Why, why――" ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    MSG([[ Lady Hermes’ scream echoed throughout the auditorium. ]])

    MSG([[ The painfulness of her voice only dampened the crowd’s spirits even more. ]])

    MSG([[ Gradually, her dance became less precise, her voice trembled with anxiety, and her complexion worsened. ]])

    MSG([[ Intuitively, I knew this was bad. ]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（真剣）
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_DAR01ba")
LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0934.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Daria-san, please stop Hermes-sama’s performance!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0618.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Yes, I understand. Hey Hermes, stop now! Stop the dance――" ]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（真剣）、アルメリア・ラスボス（悲しみ）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU03da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0509.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "No!! I won’t stop...! I’m an idol, you know!? I have to make everyone smile!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ef")
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,200,100)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ARU03da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0510.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I will make everyone smile!! So I won’t stop! Absolutely not! I mustn’t stopーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー！！！！！！" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",300,false)

EFFECT_SCREEN(1 , 30 ,30, 1000 , false , false)

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024eb")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,500,500)
LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,500,Ease.OutCubic)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",500,false)

    -- //SE：ハウリング音
    PLAY_SE("SEa041.wav")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU03da")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_DAR01ba")
LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0935.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Ugh...!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0619.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Guh...! H-Hermes! That volume――" ]])

    -- //SE：爆発音
    PLAY_SE("SEa042.wav")

    EFFECT_SCREEN(1 , 20 , 40 , 300,false,false)
    WAIT(300)

    -- //SE：ガラスの破砕音
    PLAY_SE("SEb050.wav")

    MSG([[ There was a sound of something exploding and glass breaking somewhere. ]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（真剣）
--LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_DAR01ba")
--LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,false)

LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-400,500,Ease.InCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- //SE：床に倒れる音
    PLAY_SE("SEc019.wav")
    WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ At the same time, Lady Hermes collapsed to the floor. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0936.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Hermes-sama!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0620.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Hermes!!" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ Rushing to her side, it looked like she had lost consciousness. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt a bit relieved. What remained worrying was the explosion and glass-breaking sound from earlier. ]])

    MSG([[ If a machine exploded like the other day, we must put out the fire quickly... ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Eh!? What!? Is that smoke!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "No way, is it a fire!? Where is it coming from!?" ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav",0)

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

SET_EFFECT_FIRE_02(10)

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-960,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,960,0,30000,Ease.OutCubic)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ It seems we were a step too late. Black smoke began billowing in the auditorium, spreading chaos. ]])

    MSG([[ To make matters worse, outside guests unfamiliar with the auditorium layout were present. This could easily lead to severe confusion. ]])


STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ef")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-2800,400)
-- //BU：リラ（真剣）、エリカ（真剣）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERI01ba")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)

--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2156.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, it looks like the sound equipment on the opposite side caught fire!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1409.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "The curtain backstage is catching fire too! We’ll try to put it out, so Uran-senpai, please guide the evacuation!" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BU」ダリア（真剣）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0937.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Understood. Daria-san, please take Hermes-sama toward the exit and guide everyone else as well." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0621.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Got it. But Uran-kun, what do you intend to do? You need to head to the exit too, or the smoke—" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0938.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I’m fine. As 'Princess Priestess,' I will do what I must." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0622.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...Don’t overdo it." ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Seeing Daria-san off, I stood at the center of the stage. ]])

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    -- //effect：煙

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    MSG([[ The audience was uncertain whether to move or not and remained frozen in place. ]])

    MSG([[ A burning smell. Black smoke faintly rising, swirling with anxiety, impatience, and confusion. ]])

    MSG([[ To break this situation, someone must lead correctly. ]])


STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

    -- //BG：ステージ上
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024eb")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0939.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Everyone, please stay calm." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My voice echoed through the auditorium, and everyone’s desperate gaze turned to me. ]])

    MSG([[ I called out in the calmest expression and gentle voice I could manage. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0940.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It is said we have over five minutes before the fire spreads seriously." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0941.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Everyone here is a proud Yuriai Private Academy student. That’s more than enough time to evacuate." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0942.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Now, without haste, let’s proceed single file to the exit. As students of Yuriai Academy, let us not forget propriety." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Responding to my call, the students began moving. ]])

    MSG([[ But unlike before, they formed proper lines as they proceeded. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0943.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 (When I was first called ‘Princess Priestess,’ I was confused, but who would’ve thought this would come in handy like this?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That title stemmed from someone saying my clumsy movements looked like a 'priestess’s dance.' ]])

    MSG([[ I once bitterly mocked the cruel fate of being called a 'Miko'—a servant devoted to the gods. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0944.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I will no longer demean myself or curse my fate." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0945.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Because thanks to this nature, I was able to save so many people." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    -- //effect：煙

    -- //BU：ダリア（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-1700,600)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_DAR01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0623.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Exit in two lines here! Panic could cause serious injuries! Move slowly and surely!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Daria-san began guiding others at the exit. ]])

    MSG([[ Good. This should be a relief. ]])

    MSG([[ I joined the line to evacuate―― ]])

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,150,150)
LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,450,800)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",500,false)
    -- //effect：煙

    -- //BU：モブ男性、モブ女性
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB02aa")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,0,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,200,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("arrogantman_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Arrogant Man】
 "H-Hey, don’t cut in! I’m first!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("suit-woman_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Woman in Suit】
 "Such a wimpy guy! Move, old man!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×３
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB07aa")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,-500,0)
LAYER_POSITION(60,-400,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-550,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-50,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
